posts.post_content:
Ive been looking for a pretty specific card and recently got one pulled out from under me.  Looking for:

SGC Green label Piedmont 150 Johnson portrait 3 or 4.

I have attached an example for reference.  Now I know if I had one like this in my collection I wouldn't sell it, but if you happen to have two I'd like to buy your other one.

Thanks,
Phil Lewis
